screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pkt file in Cisco Packet Tracer 8.1
screenshot.caption: PKT file open in Cisco Packet Tracer 8.1

description: Cisco Packet Tracer features a learning environment where students, trainees, and seasoned professionals can practice their network management skills. Packet Tracer comes with sample PKT simulation files, but the software also allows you to create your own.

To create a PKT file with Packet Tracer, select File → New , design the simulation model, then select File → Save as... . After saving a simulation as a PKT file, you can close it and re-open it for further editing.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pkt file in Cisco Packet Tracer 8.1
images.caption: PKT file open in Cisco Packet Tracer 8.1
